title: PUCSL announces tomorrow’s power shedding
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) today announced power shedding for tomorrow as a result of fuel scarcity and the absence of power generators.
Accordingly, Areas A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K and L will experience two-and-a-half hours from 8.00 am to 6.00 pm and one hour and 15 minutes from 6.00 pm to 11.00 pm.
Areas that come under P, Q, R, S, T, U, V and W group will experience two hours from 9.00 am to 5.00 pm and one hour from 5.00 pm to 9.00 pm, the PUCSL said.
They also said the new area definition is available at PUCSL and CEB's official Web sites. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
